alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew; Brown; Daviess; Greene; Jackson; Knox; Lawrence; Martin; Monroe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 3:40PM EDT until June 29 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Monroe County in south central Indiana... Southern Brown County in south central Indiana... Southwestern Bartholomew County in central Indiana... Southeastern Knox County in southwestern Indiana... Martin County in southwestern Indiana... Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Indiana... Lawrence County in south central Indiana... Western Jackson County in south central Indiana... Southern Daviess County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 339 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Spencer to near Vincennes, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Ellettsville around 345 PM EDT. Indiana University and Whitehall around 355 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Lake Lemon, Woodville Hills, Yellowwood Lake, Story, Elkinsville, Stone Head, Spurgeons Corner, Waymansville and Cortland. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 58 and 64. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bartholomew; Brown; Daviess; Greene; Jackson; Knox; Lawrence; Martin; Monroe
